QuestionText: Who holds the record for the most goals scored in a single FIFA World Cup tournament?
Which athlete holds the world record for the fastest 100-meter sprint?
Who is the only tennis player to have won the Golden Slam (all four Grand Slams and Olympic gold in the same year)?
Which NBA player holds the record for the most career points scored?
Who holds the record for the most Olympic gold medals in swimming?
Which cricketer has scored the most runs in Test cricket history?
Who holds the record for the most consecutive wins in Formula 1 races?
Which female athlete holds the world record for the marathon?
Who holds the record for the most home runs in a single MLB season?
Which gymnast has won the most Olympic medals in history?
